t: Mariah Carey [VINYL] by Carey, Mariah: Amazon.co.uk: CDs & Vinyl
s: Mariah Carey was only 20 years of age when she released her debut single "Vision of Love", a song which showcased her incredible vocal range and songwriting skill. That song is included on this album, along with other singles "Someday" and "Love Takes Time". I just love her voice on this album.

s: Mariah Carey will always be my favorite singer. Her voice is liquid soul, and expresses the range of emotions we feel in life.
